Package org.codehaus.griffon.jsilhouette.geom

Interface Summary
Centered  
 

Class Summary
Almond Defines an almond or Vesica Piscis shape.
Arrow Defines an arrow shape.
Asterisk Defines an asterisk shape that may have round corners.
Astroid Defines an Astroid shape.
Balloon Defines a text balloon shape (like the ones used on tooltips & comics).
Cross Defines a cross shape that may have round corners.
Donut Defines a donut shape based on circles or regular polygons.
Fan Defines a fan shape whose blades can vary in shape.
Lauburu Defines a Lauburu shape.
MultiRoundRectangle Defines a rounded rectangle, each corner may have a different roundness factor.
Rays Defines a rays shape.
RegularPolygon Defines a regular polygon shape.
ReuleauxTriangle Defines a Reuleaux triangular shape.
RoundPin Defines a rounded pushpin shape.
ShapeUtils  
Star Defines a star shape.
Triangle Defines a triangular shape [equilateral | isosceles | right].
